forum.name: T3D1 Discussion: Using Standardized Tests to Identify Strengths and Needs
forum.intro:
Your responses to A Basic Primer for Understanding Standardized Tests and Using Test Scores

Based on your reading, and considering how test scores are/can be used to identify your students’ strengths and needs, please post your responses to the following questions:

  • If you already do use standardized test scores to identify strengths and needs, how would you describe what you do?  How useful is it? How might you change/improve this process? 
  • If you don’t currently use standardized test scores in this way, what are some examples of how you might modify your instruction or program processes to do so? How do you think this change might improve student learning?

After you post, please take time to review others posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on and Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
